entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasDefaultValue(constant) #25648
    customer-reported
  • "Possible null reference return" in auto-generated compiled model #25647
    customer-reported
  • Unexcepted result when use .Contains() in .Where() #25644
    customer-reported

Closed

  • ISO Dates are malfunctioning #25646
    closed-question, customer-reported

Updated

  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #19856
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-change-tracking, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • Recursive Hierarchy in self referenced table - ef core 5 #25649
    customer-reported
  • Allow users to check connection string used by database update operation #15689
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, good first issue, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • Can't explicit load many-to-many relationships. #24329
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query
  • Improve exception message for projection with JSON field conversion #21602
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query
  • Column 'x' is invalid in the select list because it is not contained in either an aggregate function or the GROUP BY clause.' #21036
    type-bug, customer-reported, verify-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Dependency issues between visitors #20445
    type-bug, area-query, punted-for-5.0, Risky, 6.0.0
  • DefaultIfEmpty applied on child collection wipes the parent info in query result #19095
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, punted-for-5.0, Risky, 6.0.0
  • Contains on a readonly collection throws InvalidOperation exception. #18658
    type-bug, customer-reported, verify-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • FirstOrDefault after custom projection == null cannot be translated #18476
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Delete unacceptable symbols from query parameter #19481
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, waiting-for-response
  • 6.0 API Reviews #24743
    type-enhancement, area-global, 6.0.0
  • Internal exceptions when using .AsSplitQuery #25225
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Select + Distinct + Select Collection results in incorrect SQL and results #24263
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, Risky, 6.0.0
  • Pre-configuration value conversion for struct doesn't work for nullable properties of the struct #25416
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Improve exception message for invalid pre-convention configurations #25521
    type-bug, area-perf, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply pre-convention configuration to nullable instances #25638

Merged

  • Query: Remove redundant override of TranslateSubquery #25637
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25643
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25619
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25642
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25641
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25640
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25639
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Better pattern match to add code to join fetch entity when inc… #25636
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25635
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #25652
  • Fix Cosmos update exception wrapping #25651
